snippet: Lewis Hamilton won the pole position for Sunday’s Italian Grand Prix in Monza after finishing fastest in qualifying, with his teammate Jenson Button giving McLaren a one-two finish.
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton won the pole position for Sunday’s Italian Grand Prix in Monza after finishing fastest in qualifying, with his teammate Jenson Button giving McLaren a one-two finish.

headline.seo: Hamilton Wins Pole at Italian Grand Prix in Monza
